mapper.select: SELECT card_comp, card_num, card_date, card_cvc FROM CARD WHERE card_seq=#{card_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARD(card_seq, card_comp, card_num, card_date, card_cvc) VALUES(#{card_seq}, #{card_comp}, #{card_num}, #{card_date}, #{card_cvc})
mapper.update: UPDATE CARD SET (card_comp, card_num, card_date, card_cvc)=(#{card_comp}, #{card_num}, #{card_date}, #{card_cvc}) WHERE card_seq=#{card_seq}
